an4.90:2.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sekho hoti appattamānaso, anuttaraṁ yogakkhemaṁ patthayamāno viharati.
an4.90:2.3: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, puggalo samaṇamacalo hoti.
an4.90:3.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu pañcasu upādānakkhandhesu udayabbayānupassī viharati:
an4.90:3.3: ‘iti rūpaṁ, iti rūpassa samudayo, iti rūpassa atthaṅgamo;
an4.90:3.7: iti viññāṇaṁ, iti viññāṇassa samudayo, iti viññāṇassa atthaṅgamo’ti;
an4.90:3.8: no ca kho aṭṭha vimokkhe kāyena phusitvā viharati.
an4.90:3.9: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, puggalo samaṇapuṇḍarīko hoti.
an4.90:4.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu pañcasu upādānakkhandhesu udayabbayānupassī viharati:
an4.90:4.3: ‘iti rūpaṁ, iti rūpassa samudayo, iti rūpassa atthaṅgamo;
an4.90:4.7: iti viññāṇaṁ, iti viññāṇassa samudayo, iti viññāṇassa atthaṅgamo’ti;
an4.90:4.8: aṭṭha ca vimokkhe kāyena phusitvā viharati.
an4.90:4.9: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, puggalo samaṇapadumo hoti.
an4.90:5.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, puggalo samaṇesu samaṇasukhumālo hoti?
an4.90:5.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu yācitova bahulaṁ cīvaraṁ paribhuñjati, appaṁ ayācito …pe… mameva taṁ, bhikkhave, sammā vadamāno vadeyya samaṇesu samaṇasukhumāloti.
an4.90:5.3: Ime kho, bhikkhave, cattāro puggalā santo saṁvijjamānā lokasmin”ti.
